meanings.definition: The fatty part of milk from which butter is made.
meanings.sent1: The butterfat gives butter its rich taste.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for a specific amount of butterfat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat licked the butterfat off the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as butterfat, soothing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the butterfat made the dish look irresistible.

meanings.sent1: Too much butterfat can make the cake too greasy.
meanings.sent2: The butterfat percentage is crucial in baking.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they sculpted animals out of butterfat.
meanings.sent4: His words were coated in butterfat, trying to sweeten the harsh truth.
meanings.sent5: The butterfat melted slowly, creating a creamy sauce for the pasta.
